column5: "You Blew it up! Damn you! Damn you all to hell!"  From Planet of the Apes. Still a classic.  RIP
His best role was playing himself in "Bowling for Columbine".
DAMN DIRTY APES  he was a star
One of the best 'Character' actors. Still enjoy the re-runs. No-one to match him nowadays,

whether you agree with his stand on things or not most would agree he was one of the greatest actors of all time.  i think his greatest line was delivered to president clinton when he said "America doesn't trust you with our 21-year-old daughters, and we sure, Lord, don't trust you with our guns."   jason
Wonder if someone has gone and taken his gun yet.
The Omega man has finally bit the dust. (That has got to be the worst movie ever!)

Yup, too bad, he was one heck of an actor. I was watching something over the weekend about Michael Moore's movie and Charton Heston being misquoted and set up. That guy is a jerk!! Before anyone starts on the gun policies of the U.S., remember a bit about their history, if some people did not have guns back in the 1700's, there would not be a US of A.
I wonder if they are making him into "Soylent Green" ! It's people! It's people! LOL! http://www.soylent-green.com/ HH
